channel.title: RSC Private server help needed {Divine PK V5.0}
channel.description:
I need help editing the EXP rates for my RSC private server, the server is run on Divine PK V5.0. I have found most things such as how to change what monsters drop on death, and how to change items to F2P or P2P. But the one thing I just can't find is how to change the EXP rates.
Thanks in advance for any help that someone can provide to me.

item.title: RSC Private server help needed {Divine PK V5.0}
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

Next time actually look at all the boards, how hard can it be?

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Private server help needed {Divine PK V5.0}
item.dc:creator: @Zian Zian
item.description:
@Zian wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:2, topic:236707”]This belongs in the’ Server and Client Help’ section under the RuneScape Classic Server Emulation Category.

It is located Here.[/quote]

Oh ok thanks, sorry I am new to this forum.

Is there some way I can delete this topic my self or can only a MOD/admin do that?

Read full topic
